title: Rent by the week or month, Basketball hoops, Full kitchen in apartment
posting_body: ['Boulder II Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Easy freeway access', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Laundry facilities', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Jacuzzi available for tenants', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Basketball hoops', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
